data.description: 01 July 2024: A Red Cross medical crew in a camp, on their way to transport casualties from a house that was on fire, was stopped and turned around by Israeli forces.

01 July 2024: A Red Cross crew were denied access to a casualty in a camp by Israeli forces screaming at them through speakers. After contacting Red Cross, they was allowed to access the camp after Israeli forces left.
01 July 2024: A male nurse was killed by Israeli bombing.

As reported on 01 July 2024: A medical student was arrested by Israeli forces and imprisoned for ten days before his release. During his time in captivity, he was stripped, beaten, tortured and used as a human shield.
02 July 2024: The head of a medical facility's burns and plastic surgery department was killed along with 11 others, including family members, when an Israeli airstrike hit a house.

02 July 2024: Medical staff and patients fled a medical facility in fear that it would become non-functional based on past experiences of medical facilitys located in evacuation areas. The majority of patients were referred to another medical facility which reached full capacity. On 27th July, the Gaza MoH stated that they were no longer able to restore the functionality of the medical facility.

02 July 2024: The ICRC transferred its medical-surgical team from a medical facility to a Red Cross field medical facility. On 27th July, the Gaza MoH stated that they were no longer able to restore the functionality of the medical facility.
03 July 2024: In Khan Yunis Camp, the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli explosives, killing at least one Palestinian and injuring 10.
05 July 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, the vicinity of a pharmacy was hit by suspected Israeli forces, killing six Palestinians and injuring an unspecified number, including children.
As reported on 05 July 2024: A UN-agency and its partners were forced to direct limited fuel supplies to key medical facilitys due to continued Israeli restrictions.
05 July 2024: A PRCS crew was beaten with Israeli firearms, and their ambulance attacked, while on duty during clashes.
05 July 2024: A psychologist was killed in her home by Israeli airstrikes.

07 July 2024: Health workers evacuated patients from an NGO-supported medical facility in response to Israeli forces declaring the surrounding area a 'red zone'. The medical facility partially resumed activities on 11 July.
07 July 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli fire drones. Subsequently, the area was declared a red zone by Israeli forces.
07 July 2024: A medical facility warned that the medical facility would stop within hours if fuel were not available.
08 July 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
As of 08 July 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility was evacuated in fear of nearby Israeli tanks and intensified military activities. Around 14 July, it resumed paediatric services.
08 July 2024: Ambulance and civil defence teams were unable to reach the wounded or dead from under the rubble amidst a military operation by Israeli forces.
08 July 2024: An IDF paramedic was reportedly severely injured by mortar fire.
As reported on 09 July 2024: All PRCS medical points and emergency clinics in the governorate were out of service due to forced evacuation by Israeli forces of surrounding areas.
09 July 2024: A medical facility was surrounded by two Israeli military vehicles.
09 July 2024: The PRCS were unable to respond to emergency calls due to heavy Israeli bombing in the area.
09 July 2023: A doctor was killed when Israeli forces reportedly targeted a nearby medical facility.
10 July 2024: An INGO health facility was forced to temporarily close after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for Gaza city.
10 July 2024: A medical facility reported a shortage of blood supplies and called on local people to donate.
As reported on 11 July 2024: A clinic was destroyed by Israeli forces.
11 July 2024: A clinic containing a pharmaceutical warehouse and public health laboratory was destroyed by Israeli forces.
11 July 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

As reported on 12 July 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility was destroyed for the second time by Israeli forces airstrikes after recently being restored and reopened. Around 14 July, it resumed paediatric services.
12 July 2024: Near Balata Refugee Camp, an ambulance was fired at by Israeli forces.
12 July 2024: The vicinity of a Red Cross medical facility was subjected to machine gun and artillery fire from Israeli tanks firing at Palestinians and their homes.
13 July 2024: A nurse was killed by Israeli airstrikes.

13 July 2024: A medical facility was forced to suspend operations due to numbers of casualties and severe shortages of medical supplies, beds and personnel, after receiving the majority of victims of an airstrike.
15 July 2024: A medical facility was raided and turned into a military base by Israeli forces.
19 July 2024: More than 11 settlers, one armed with a rifle, smashed the windows of an ambulance.
22 July 2024: A medical facility in a camp reported a shortage of blood supplies and called on local people to donate.
22 July 2024: A female physiotherapist was killed in her home by Israeli forces airstrikes.

22 July 2024: The grounds of a medical facility were hit by an Israeli drone that struck a journalists' tent. Two people were killed, namely a journalist and a political researcher, and an unspecified number of people injured.
22 July 2024: A Red Cross supported clinic was forced out of service after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for the area and carried out a raid.
22 July 2024: A Red Cross supported clinic, run by a UN agency, was forced out of service after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for the area and carried out a raid.
23 July 2024: In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, ambulance crews were blocked by Israeli forces from accessing civilians killed or injured in the camp.
23 July 2024: Red Cross crews in a camp were blocked by Israeli forces from accessing civilians killed or injured in an Israeli explosive attack.
23 July 2024: A female paramedic and a male civilian were shot and killed by Israeli forces.
24 July 2024: The vicinity of NGO medical facility was hit by Israeli forces artillery..
24 July 2024: A Red Cross crew in a camp on their way to transport casualties were obstructed by Israeli army vehicles.
24 July 2024: Red Cross health workers were obstructed by Israeli forces on their way to transport a suffocation casualty.
24 July 2024: A PRCS ambulance was fired upon and damaged by Israeli forces while en route to assist an injured civilian.

24 July 2024: A Red Cross crew was assaulted, forced to remove their protective vests, and prevented from reaching a patient by Israeli forces in a camp. Their ambulance was also searched and damaged, despite prior coordination.
24 July 2024: The Red Cross was prevented by Israeli forces from reaching the body of a customs officer and evacuating an injured officer, both of whom had been shot by undercover Israeli agents.
25 July 2024: The vicinity of NGO medical facility was hit by Israeli forces artillery.
25 July 2024: A PRCS ambulance was hit by Israeli live bullets while the crew was evacuating an injured civilian.
25 July 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by suspected Israeli forces. Three people were killed.

27 July 2024: A field medical facility within a school was hit in an Israeli airstrike, killing 31 Palestinians including children and injuring over 100 others. The facility, situated in a supposedly safe area, shelters thousands of displaced individuals.
As reported on 27 July 2024: A health centre was forced out of service after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for the area.
As reported on 27 July 2024: A health centre was forced out of service after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for the area.
27 July 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
As reported on 27 July 2024: A health centre was forced out of service after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order for the area.

27 July 2024: In Balata Refugee Camp, a volunteer PRCS paramedic and eight others were injured and a Palestinian youth killed in an Israeli drone strike on the camp. Two were left in critical condition. The paramedic succumbed to his wounds on 2nd August.
28 July 2024: Four Red Cross ambulance were fired at by Israeli forces and denied access to casualties within a camp.

30 July 2024: A medical clinic was raided by Israeli forces; the main door was blown up, cash was stolen, and all medicines and medical tools were damaged. An employee of the clinic was detained for several hours during the raid.

As reported on 30 July 2024: A health worker was shot in the knee by Israeli soldiers in a medical facility after refusing to stop operating on a patient. He was then arrested and taken to an Israeli prison where he was kept for 45 days, enduring torture. Upon his release, an Israeli soldier struck him in the face with a rifle butt, destroying his eye.
01 September 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, paramedics were prevented from reaching an elderly Palestinian who had been shot and run over by Israeli forces.
02 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to casualties of a shelling by Israeli forces. The ambulance team responded once IDF withdrew.
03 August 2024: Medical teams and fire brigades were prevented by armed Israeli forces from reaching the injured and putting out the fire from their attack in the village alongside Israeli settlers.
03 August 2024: A school was hit for a second time by Israeli airstrikes while paramedics and civilians were recovering casualties and wounded from the first strike.
03 August 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility was massively damaged by the Israeli military offensive in the city.
04 August 2024: A volunteer nurse was killed when a medical point was struck by Israeli airstrikes.
04 August 2024: Two displaced Palestinian tents inside a medical facility yard were struck by Israeli drones, killing at least five people and injuring 18 others.
04 August 2024: An ambulance vehicle was fired at by Israeli forces when it arrived to treat an injured Palestinian.
05 August 2024: In a camp, Israeli forces quadcopter were present near a medical facility.
05 August 2024: A Red Cross crew were denied access by Israeli forces to a patient suffering from suffocation.

05 August 2024: A medical facility was entered by Israeli forces during an operation in the town, prompting Palestinians to throw stones at them. Israeli forces retaliated with live ammunition, killing a young boy in the vicinity of the medical facility.

06 August 2024: Red Cross crew members were obstructed from reaching casualties and held at gunpoint by Israeli forces. Some crew members were escorted to collect casualties but Israeli soldiers pushed them off their stretchers.
06 August 2024: At least two Red Cross ambulances were fired upon and prevented by Israeli forces from reaching casualties in the shelled area.
06 August 2024: A volunteer paramedic was killed by an Israeli drone strike.

06 August 2024: Red Cross medics were physically assaulted, had their phones seized and were beaten at the back of their ambulance at gunpoint by Israeli forces when they arrived to assist a man who had just been shot and killed by the latter.
08 August 2024: A medical facility was bombed repeatedly by Israeli forces.
09 August 2024: Red Cross emergency medical services were hindered by the interruption of communication and internet services.
09 August 2024: A nurse was killed when his home was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
10 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was damaged by an Israeli gunshot.
10 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance were stopped at a checkpoint by Israeli forces who took photographs of the patient within. The patient companion was also threatened.
10 August 2024: Two Red Cross ambulance vehicles were stopped at a checkpoint by Israeli forces who took photographs of the casualties within.
10 August 2024: Ambulance vehicles carrying injured civilians were obstructed and searched at a checkpoint by Israeli forces, causing a delay in emergency and medical services.

10 August 2024: Two doctors who were brother and sister, and their mother were killed when their house in the vicinity of a school was hit by Israeli forces bombing. Rescue teams evacuated at least 25 people from the vicinity of the school, including pupils.
11 August 2024: A medical facility was damaged by nearby Israeli bombing, putting it temporarily out of service.
11 August 2024: A paramedic, along with his sister and other relatives, were killed by an Israeli airstrike.
13 August 2024: A pharmacist and her three-day old twins were killed after an Israeli airstrike struck their apartment located within the Israeli designated humanitarian zone.
13 August 2024: Palestinian paramedics were prevented from approaching an 18-year-old boy who was shot and killed by Israeli forces.
14 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was delayed for 40 minutes by Israeli forces while responding to shelling victims.
14 August 2024: A female medical student was arrested by Israeli forces at a checkpoint and sentenced to six months in prison without charge or trial.
15 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was damaged by shrapnel from an Israeli missile.
15 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access to victims and asked to leave the site of shelling in a camp by Israeli forces for at least 30 minutes.
15 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access to victims and asked to leave the site of shelling in a camp by Israeli forces for at least 30 minutes.
15 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a casualty who had been run over by Israeli forces.
15 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance carrying a shelling patient in a camp was stopped by Israeli forces who photographed the patient before allowing them to pass.

15 August 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the parents and sisters of a Palestinian paramedic were killed after an Israeli airstrike struck his family’s home. In total, seven people were killed and an unspecified numbers injured.

17 August 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an NGO medical facility faced a critical fuel shortage due to severe restrictions on fuel deliveries by Israeli forces, warning of closure within 24 hours. On 19th, all surgery operations had been postponed

18 August 2024: The PRCS reported that its ambulances, emergency medical clinics, and relief services were at risk of being halted due to the lack of fuel, with its teams already operating at minimum capacity and only two out of eight ambulances functioning across two governorates.
As reported on 18 August 2024: Conditions were critical at a medical facility, where fuel and medical supply shortages were reportedly threatening to cease operations in the next 24 hours.
19 August 2024: A male nurse was killed by Israeli forces drone strike.
21 August 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was encroached upon by Israeli forces.
21 August 2024: A medical facility reported a shortage of fuel.
21 August 2024: An INGO's compound used to house their Emergency Medical Team was damaged by shelling, rendering it uninhabitable.

22 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access to victims of shelling in a camp by Israeli forces. After contact, Red Cross health workers within the camp were able to deliver bodies to the ambulances through a different route.
22 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was stopped by Israeli forces while transporting a patient to hospital. The patient's ID was taken before being allowed to pass.

22 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access to victims of shelling in a camp by Israeli forces. After contact, Red Cross health workers within the camp were able to deliver bodies to the ambulances through a different route.

22 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access to victims of shelling in a camp by Israeli forces. After contact, Red Cross health workers within the camp were able to deliver bodies to the ambulances through a different route.
22 August 2024: A clinic was demolished by Israeli tanks during a military operation.
23 August 2024: The vicinity of an NGO medical facility was entered by Israeli vehicles and hit by artillery. IDF withdrew from the area on 30 August.
24 August 2024: A reportedly broken gate at a checkpoint delayed movement by four hours, resulting in the failure to deliver 10,000 vaccines, 58 pallets of medicine, and 24,000 litres of fuel.
24 August 2024: The second floor of the rehabilitation department at a PRCS medical facility was fired upon by Israeli drones.
25 August 2024: A medical facility was at risk of ceasing operations due to severe shortage of fuel. A UN-agency delivered fuel three days later.
25 August 2023: The vicinity of an NGO medical facility was hit by suspected Israeli bombing.
26 August 2024: In a camp, Israeli forces launched a raid in the vicinity of a medical facility.

26 August 2024: Over 500 people within an NGO-supported medical facility fled due to close proximity to the latest evacuation areas and an explosion that occurred 250 metres from the medical facility. The NGO considered temporarily suspending wound care while trying to maintain life-saving treatment.
28 August 2024: A medical facility was surrounded by Israeli military vehicles who imposed a blockade, hindering ambulance movements.
28 August 2024: A medical facility was surrounded by Israeli military vehicles who imposed a blockade, hindering ambulance movements.
28 August 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a medical facility was surrounded by Israeli forces who blocked roads to the facility with earth mounds during an operation in the camp.
27-28 August 2024: The headquarters of the Red Cross was besieged by Israeli forces.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance carrying a woman in labour in a camp was denied access by Israeli forces for two hours. She was eventually transported by another crew.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and inspected by Israeli forces, who forced out the crew and interrogated the patient, as they arrived at a medical facility.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp, dispatched to help an ambulance that was stuck in the mud, was denied access by Israeli forces.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting a dialysis patient in a camp was delayed for over two hours by Israeli forces.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a kidney patient by Israeli forces who inspected the crew while forcing them to lift their clothes.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was prevented from accessing casualties in a camp by Israeli forces.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and inspected by Israeli forces, who forced out the crew and inspected the patient's ID, before granting them entry.
28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was denied access to a patient for 40 minutes by Israeli forces. The team was granted access after further coordination.

28 August 2024: At a medical facility, a Red Cross ambulance carrying a woman in labour was stopped by Israeli forces, who forced the crew out with their arms and shirts lifted up while the ambulance was inspected.

28 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance carrying a patient in a camp was stopped and inspected by Israeli forces. When they were allowed to pass, the crew were forced to drive through a destroyed area, causing the ambulance to sink in the mud.

28 August 2024: A medical facility in a camp was besieged by Israeli forces who threatened to raid the facility during an operation in the camp. Ambulances and medical teams outside were inspected and obstructed from reaching the medical facility. Ambulances carrying patients continued to be obstructed the following day.
27-28 August 2024: The headquarters of a health INGO was besieged by Israeli forces.

28 August 2024: In al Far’a Refugee Camp, the PRCS's medical centre was stormed and raided by Israeli forces who assaulted the director of the facility, detained the team and cut off all communication. Shots were fired inside the building. The IDF withdrew after a few hours.
28 August 2024: Two Red Cross ambulances were blocked from accessing casualties in a camp killed by Israeli forces in a drone strike. One was eventually allowed to pass.
28 August 2024: Red Cross paramedics in a camp were prevented from reaching a man who had been shot and killed by Israeli soldiers during a military operation. His body was retrieved the next day.
28 August 2024: At least two Palestinian ambulances were obstructed and inspected by Israeli soldiers during a military operation.
29 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was denied access to a dialysis patient for almost three hours by Israeli forces with bulldozers, despite prior coordination.
29 August 2024: A Red Cross crew were given only two minutes by Israeli forces to evacuate an injured patient while forcing a health worker to keep their hands up.
29 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and searched by Israeli forces while transporting a kidney patient.
29 August 2024: A Red Cross crew on the way to transport a patient to a medical facility was insulted with profanity and fired at by Israeli forces with preemptive bullets, obstructing them.

29 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew was stopped by Israeli forces who inspected their IDs. After 20 minutes, the crew proceeded but were forced to take alternative roads, delaying access to the patient.

29 August 2024: A Red Cross central operations room lost all contact with one of their ambulance centres and crews amidst a Israeli operation. Cellular and landline networks and the internet were cut off and wireless transmission devices did not work.
30 August 2024: A nurse and his brother were killed when Israeli airstrikes struck a home.
30 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was fired at and damaged by Israeli forces whome shone lasers at the crew.
30 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was forced to take an alternative and longer route when Israeli forces fired preemptive bullets in the air, delaying their access to the patient.
30 August 2024: A Red Cross crew were denied access to a woman in labour by Israeli forces who forced them to leave the area.
30 August 2024: Three Red Cross health workers were injured when their ambulance was fired at by Israeli forces, damaging it.
Between 30 August - 01 September 2024: The movement of ambulances and medical teams was impeded and delayed by Israeli forces during a military operation.
31 August 2024: A Red Cross ambulance travelling to a woman in labour was stopped and searched by Israeli forces. The crew were forced to step out and lift up their clothes.

31 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was yelled at, insulted with profanity, and forced out of the ambulance with their hands up by Israeli forces while they inspected the vehicle. The crew was denied access to their patient.

31 August 2024: A Red Cross crew were forced from their ambulance, lined up on a wall with their hands up, and physically inspected by Israeli forces, after their IDs were confiscated. Their ambulance was attacked and fired at twice.
31 August 2024: A Red Cross crew was partially stripped and physically inspected by Israeli forces during an inspection of their ambulance.
31 August 2024: A physiotherapist, his brother and two sisters were killed after an Israeli airstrike hit their home.
31 August 2024: The vicinity of a UN-agency clinic was hit in an Israeli air strike, killing a woman.
31 August 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, ambulance teams were prevented from reaching an unspecified number of individuals killed by Israeli forces during a military operation inside the camp.
31 August 2024: Ambulances carrying patients were prevented from reaching a medical facility by Israeli forces.
31 August 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a PRCS ambulance was fired upon by Israeli forces despite prior coordination for its entry into the camp.
31 August 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a PRCS team was prevented from reaching two deceased Palestinians by Israeli forces.
01 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli bombing.
01 September 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit in an Israeli airstrike, killing two Palestinian and injuring several others.
01 September 2024: Water trucks were prevented from reaching a besieged medical facility by Israeli soldiers stationed at its gate, forcing the medical facility to suspend it dialysis services.
01 September 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, an unspecified number of ambulances were prevented from entering a besieged medical facility by Israeli forces.
02 September 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, eight Palestinians were reportedly killed and an unspecified number injured, when they were hit near the gate of a school by Israeli forces bombing.

02 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew on their way to collect casualties was denied access to the attack site by Israeli forces. After the area was cleared, it was discovered that there were no casualties.
02 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike.

As reported on 02 September 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an NGO supported medical facility was at risk of suspending maternity services and daily surgeries, including C-sections, due to fuel shortages.
As reported on 02 September 2024: A private medical facility faced considerable operational limitations due to shortages of fuel and supplies
02 September 2024: A doctor was arrested during the raid of a clinic by Israeli forces.
02 September 2024: A PRCS ambulance was stopped and searched by Israeli forces during an ongoing siege on the city.
02 September 2024: A medical facility was further besieged by Israeli forces during a military raid on the city. It had been surrounded and blockades imposed since 28th August.
02 September 2024: A medical facility was further besieged by Israeli forces during a military raid on the city. It had been surrounded and blockades imposed since 28th August.

03 September 2024: A Red Cross crew and their patients were forced out of their ambulance upon arrival at a besieged medical facility. Two patients and their IDs were inspected before being allowed into the facility.

03 September 2024: A PRCS ambulance was shot at by Israeli forces when it arrived to provide medical assistance to an injured girl. The girl was dead by the time the medical team was able to reach her.

04 September 2024: A Red Cross crew was stopped at a camp entrance by Israeli forces while responding to suffocation victims, despite prior coordination. The crews IDs were taken during the inspection.

04 September 2024: A Red Cross crew and their four patients were stopped upon arrival at a besieged medical facility by Israeli forces. Patients IDs were requested for inspection but they didn't have them. One of the patients was interrogated before allowing them into the facility.
04 September 2024: A two-man PRCS crew were stopped by Israeli forces who forcefully turned off their engine, confiscated the keys, handcuffed and beat them. One crew member was arrested.
04 September 2024: A Palestinian doctor was killed when a house was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
05 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was stormed by Israeli forces with military bulldozers positioned in front of the medical facilityâ€™s gates.

05 September 2024: An INGO-supported medical facility being used as a makeshift camp was struck by an Israeli strike, killing five Palestinian IDPs and injuring 15 others, including children. The strike resulted in the destruction and burning of many tents.
05 September 2024: In Faraa Refugee Camp, medical teams were denied access to a 16-year old boy who had been shot, killed, and dragged around the camp by a bulldozer.
05 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was struck by Israeli airstrikes, killing three people.
As reported on 05 September 2024: Joint Ministry of Health and UN polio vaccination teams were refused access to south-eastern communities to inoculate children by Israeli forces.

08 September 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, North Gaza governorate, five Palestinians including a member of the Civil Defence (PCD) were reportedly killed and an unspecified number injured when their house was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
08 September 2024: An ambulance arriving at the scene of a previous attack was opened fire on by Israeli forces, injuring an unspecified number of people.
09 September 2024: A medical facility director warned that, due to the acute scarcity of diesel fuel, the facility was forced to suspend several services to prolong operating hours.

09 September 2024: A medical facility warned they would be out of service in 48 hours due to the depletion of fuel needed to operate their departments during the continued Israeli siege and prevention of fuel entry.
As reported on 09 September 2024: Red Cross teams in the north were operating at minimum capacity due to critical fuel shortages.
09 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit, killing five Palestinians including three women and injuring an unspecified number of others.

09 September 2024: A UN polio vaccination convoy was detained, threatened and attacked by Israeli forces at a checkpoint, despite prior coordination. Shots were fired, and tanks and bulldozers damaged vehicles with staff inside. After several hours, the convoy returned to base without fulfilling its mission.
10 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting a casualty from a camp was delayed twice by Israeli forces for a total of 90 minutes.
10 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a blood pressure patient in a camp when Israeli forces fired preemptive bullets on the ground in front of the ambulance.

10 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a patient in a camp when Israeli forces fired preemptive bullets on the ground in front of the ambulance. After some time, the patient was transported to hospital

10 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew were arrested, and two staff from a supporting vehicle were detained, by Israeli forces in a camp. The supporting crew were blindfolded, beaten, handcuffed and deprived of food, drink, and access to a toilet during their detention. Both crews were released the next day.
10 September 2024: A Red Cross crew in a camp was held at gunpoint by Israeli forces who screamed at them and forced them to leave, denying them access to the patient.
10 September 2024: A volunteer paramedic and a young woman were killed during an Israeli military operation.
10 September 2024:In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, a PRCS volunteer was hit by an Israeli live bullet while providing first aid to an injured person.

10 September 2024: Two medical staff were arrested and later released, during the storming and inspection of a Red Cross medical facility by Israeli forces. The staff were prevented from providing any medical services in the governorate.
10 September 2024: In Nur Shams Refugee Camp, a medical facility was surrounded by Israeli forces during a security raid on the camp.
10 September 2024: In Tulkarm Refugee Camp, a medical facility was surrounded during an Israeli military operation.
10 September 2024: Ambulances and medical teams were obstructed from casualties by Israeli forces.
10 September 2024: An unspecified number of Red Cross paramedics were stopped and searched by Israeli forces during a military operation.

10 September 2024: In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, at least 24 people, including four school students, were unable to leave the UN school and clinic for over five hours, during an Israeli military operation in the area, before they were evacuated.

As reported on 11 September 2024: Red Cross ambulances were targeted by Israeli forces, injuring two Emergency Medical Team members and a volunteer doctor and hindering the delivery of essential supplies and medical services.

11 September 2024: In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, five bulletproof vests of PRCS were confiscated by Israeli forces. These vests belong to three PRCS EMTs who were detained in the camp and released later the same day.

11 September 2024: In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, a Red Cross team was detained by Israeli forces and contact with them was lost for two hours while en route to transport a patient, despite prior coordination. The crew were released around two hours later.

11 September 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, an Israeli airstrike hit a UN school-turned-shelter, that had recently been used to vaccinate against polio, killing 18 people, including children and six UNRWA staff.
11 September 2024: A medical facility was surrounded and besieged by Israeli forces.
11 September 2024: At least two ambulances were obstructed by Israeli forces near a medical facility.
11 September 2024: An ambulance was searched by Israeli forces at the entrance to a medical facility.
As reported on 11 September 2024: Medical assistance was hampered by restricted access, including an imposed curfew and closed-off city entrances, following an airstrike by suspected Israeli forces.
As reported on 11 September 2024: In Nur Shams Refugee Camp, medical teams were unable to reach casualties.

12 September 2024: A Red Cross crew and their child patient were obstructed at the entrance to a medical facility for 30 minutes by Israeli forces. After further coordination, they were granted entry.

12 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was denied access to a patient by Israeli forces, despite prior coordination. The patient was forced to walk to the outside of the camp to be transported.
Around 12 September 2024: A female nurse was critically injured by Israeli forces shelling while on her way to work at a medical facility. She died on 12 September while in intensive care.
12 September 2024: A Red Cross crew in a camp was denied access to a patient by Israeli forces, despite prior coordination.
12 September 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was delayed by Israeli forces for nine hours, despite prior coordination.
12 September 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
12 September 2024: An unspecified number of Palestinian ambulances were obstructed and searched by Israeli forces during a military operation in the area.
12 September 2024: A patient was detained by undercover Israeli forces from a medical facility during a raid.
14 September 2024: In Al-Maghazi Refugee Camp, the area of the UNRWA clinic was hit by Israeli artillery.
17 September 2024: In Al-Bureij Refugee Camp, ambulance crews responding to a previous airstrike were shot at by Israeli drones.
18 September 2024: A Red Cross psychologist was arrested from her home alongside her husband by Israeli forces.

18 September 2024: An ambulance transporting an infant to medical facility was obstructed by Israeli forces during clashes between Israeli settlers, Israeli forces, and Palestinians. The Red Cross medics were also beaten and verbally assaulted.
19 September 2024: A nurse, his wife and three children were killed when their home was destroyed by Israeli airstrikes.
19 September 2024: A male doctor and six other people were killed when an Israeli airstrike hit a home.
21 September 2024: In a camp, a house in the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli forces, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
21 September 2024: Ministry of Health warehouses were hit by Israeli forces, killing five employees, and injuring an unspecified number of others.
24 September 2024: Red Cross health worker was beaten and pushed around by Israeli forces while responding to victims. He was then forced to leave the scene.
25 September 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, an NGO-supported medical facility was attacked by Israeli drones.

26 September 2024: A Palestinian health and education INGO worker was killed when Hamas gunmen opened fire on her car after she reportedly refused to hand over funds to the group. Hamas claimed the incident was a mistake.

27 September 2024: The compound of NGO-supported medical facility was struck by an unspecified Israeli bomb, killing at least one person and injuring seven others. Several displaced persons tents were also destroyed.
29 September 2024: A Red Cross crew was held at gunpoint by Israeli forces who denied them access to casualties within a besieged home.
29 September 2024: A patient was arrested from a Red Cross ambulance by Israeli forces and released after two hours.
30 September 2024: The courtyard of a medical facility was reportedly fired at by an Israeli drone.
